summary: User unable to run PHP SDK tests following the documentation; tests hang when executed. Issue resolved by adding missing `temporal` section to RoadRunner configuration.
userImpact: Users following the documentation cannot run tests and experience hanging test execution, requiring external resources to troubleshoot.
rootCause: Missing `temporal` section in RoadRunner configuration file (.rr.test.yaml)
workaround: Add the `temporal` section to the RoadRunner configuration as shown in the example repository
resolutionDetails: Issue was not a bug but a documentation/configuration issue. User resolved it by consulting testing guide and example repository.
keyQuote: There is no `temporal` section in config
